modbus » library

modbus_defs.h File Reference

Detailed Description

Example modbus variables define file.

This file defines variables that used by modbus protocol.

History: Date Author Comment 08-01-2005 AceLan Kao. Create it.

Author:
AceLan Kao.(acelan_kao@moxa.com.tw)
